description: Christmas morning, Charlie Harding and Aaron Bruiser wake to open each other’s gifts. The married men each got each other something special, but Aaron definitely got Charlie what he really wanted…. Luke Adams. Charlie soon learns that his husband already played around with his gift. He has to inform Luke that the rule Charlie and Aaron have agreed to that is if one of them steps out, the other gets to sleep with their partner as well. Luke is thrilled by this rule. He offers himself to Charlie, who happily accepts his gift and fucks Luke. Aaron can’t help but feel jealous and joins in the festive morning fun.
title: My Two Daddies Part 2
